snippet: The center is part of an effort to strengthen the country’s handling of restitution of art looted by the Nazis, in the wake of international criticism.
abstract: The center is part of an effort to strengthen the country’s handling of restitution of art looted by the Nazis, in the wake of international criticism.

headline.main: German Officials Discuss Plans for a New Center for Art Restitution
headline.print_headline: Talk of Stronger Efforts On Art Looted by Nazis
